articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Chinese Communist Party Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Chinese Communist Party Delegation 
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with the delegation of cadres of the Communist Party of China led by Wang Wei, vice-minister of Supervision of China who doubles as member of the Standing Committee of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 On the occasion the head of the delegation said that the Sino-DPRK friendship provided by revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries is further developing day by day.
					
					 He noted that new progress has been made in the friendly relations between the two countries under the deep care of their top leaders.
					
					 The might of the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship was demonstrated to the whole world through events conducted on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of establishment of China-DPRK diplomatic relations and the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship", he stressed.
					
					 We are rejoiced over the signal achievements made by the Korean people in socialist economic construction, he said, expressing belief that the Korean people would achieve greater progress under the guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the future.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Communist Party Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Communist Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of cadres of the Communist Party of China.
					 The gift was handed over to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Wang Wei, member of the Standing Committee of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC and vice-minister of Supervision of China who is leading the delegation, on Thursday.

articles.title: Xu Caihou Meets KPA Political Officers Delegation
articles.content:
Xu Caihou Meets KPA Political Officers Delegation 
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Xu Caihou, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission, met the delegation of political officers of the Korean People's Army led by Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the KPA General Political Bureau, at the August 1 Building on Nov. 18.
					 Xu said that the Chinese party, government and army attach great importance to the delegation's visit to China.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship provided by Chairman Mao Zedong, Premier Zhou Enlai and President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, is a common treasure that has struck its roots deep into the minds of the two peoples, he stressed.
					
					 Noting that the friendly ties between the armies of the two countries hold an important position in the bilateral relations, he said:
					
					 The brisk exchange between the two armies will positively promote the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 We will work hard together with Korean comrades to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and the two armies onto a higher stage under the fresh situation.
					
					 We wholeheartedly wish the army and people of the DPRK bigger successes in their efforts to defend the security of the country, develop the economy and improve the standard of living.
					
					 Li Jinai, director of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, too, met with the delegation on the same day.
					
					 Saying that the CPLA and the KPA are revolutionary armies guided by the political parties, he declared that they would strive to develop the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship for all ages.

articles.title: KPA Political Officers Delegation Return Home
articles.content:
KPA Political Officers Delegation Return Home
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of political officers of the Korean People's Army led by Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the KPA General Political Bureau, came back home on Thursday after visiting China.

articles.title: Efficient "HCV-PHA" Developed
articles.content:
Efficient "HCV-PHA" Developed
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Medical Biology Research Institute under the Academy of Medical Science of the DPRK has succeeded in developing "HCV-PHA", a reagent for diagnosis of hepatitis type C virus anti-body, with the help of up-to-date technology of genetic recombination.
					 It is an ecto-diagnosis reagent for examining an anti-body in blood by using an antigen related to the hepatitis type C virus.
					
					 It, manufactured with a virus genome which was separated and refined from the serum of a patient as the main, makes it possible to identify in a scientific way the hepatitis type C virus anti-body the identification of which had been regarded as difficult.
					
					 The "HCV-PHA", whose sensitiveness and peculiarity have been confirmed through clinical test, is applied to the public health organs across the country.

articles.title: Kyongsong Spa Effective for Medical Treatment
articles.content:
Kyongsong Spa Effective for Medical Treatment
						
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Kyongsong spa in Kyongsong County, North Hamgyong Province, is famous in Korea, as it has been used for medical treatment from over 500 years ago.
					 Its water temperature is 53-60 degrees centigrade and its pH is about 9.2.
					
					 It, called sand spa, is a simple spring, which contains radon and metasilicic acid passing the limit. Its main ingredients are hydro-carbonic acid ions and sodium ions.
					
					 The spa is potent for curing rheumatic arthritis, trauma and surgical sequela, neuralgia, spine disease, chronic gastritis and other diseases.
					
					 It serves for the promotion of people's health.

articles.title: Mt. Myohyang of Superb Scenic Beauty
articles.content:
Mt. Myohyang of Superb Scenic Beauty
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Beautiful Mt. Myohyang has been known as one of six celebrated mountains and one of the eight beauty spots in Korea, which covers large areas of North and South Phyongan and Jagang provinces.
					 The grand and curious peaks, rocks of fantastic shape, deep valleys, bluff cliffs, crystal-clear water, many waterfalls, thickly wooded forest, colorful maples, murmurs of brooks and birdcalls--all these form the superb scenic beauty of the mountain.
					
					 Seen in the area are various species of plants growing in the northern and southern regions and in low and high lands. Over 30 kinds of wild animals and more than 130 kinds of birds inhabit there.
					
					 The Myohyang Stream flows, which teems with rainbow trout, char and the like.
					
					 Sited in the mountain are the International Friendship Exhibition House, a treasure house of gifts praising the great persons, and old buildings such as the Pohyon Temple showcasing the architecture of Korea in the early 11th century, several stone towers and monuments, many historical relics including 80,000 blocks of complete collection of Buddhist scriptures and wood printing plate.
					
					 Facilities for the tourists and campers have been arranged there. Among them are the Mountaineering Camp of the Pyongyang City Children's Union, Pirobong Lodging House, Hyangsan Hotel, dry food stall and spa.
					
					 Tourist routes, pavilions, flyovers and resting places have been newly built in a peculiar way to suit the beauties of nature, thus adding beauty to the mountain.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly built Mt. Myohyang Recreation Ground some time ago and underlined the need to spruce up Mt. Myohyang, the precious possession of the people, and hand it down to posterity.
					
					 The working people of all strata, overseas Koreans and foreigners enjoy the beautiful scenery of the mountain and are deeply moved by the immortal feats and warm benevolence of the peerlessly great persons associated with the mountain.

articles.title: U.S. and South Korea Urged to Stop War Moves
articles.content:
U.S. and South Korea Urged to Stop War Moves
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made sincere efforts to defuse the tension on the Korean Peninsula and improve the inter-Korean relations. However, the bellicose forces of the United States and south Korea are going ahead with frantic moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK. This once again clearly indicates that they are primarily to blame for escalating the military confrontation and tension and increasing the danger of a war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' presence in south Korea and their daily intensifying moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK are the main factor of disturbing peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					  The article cites facts to prove that during their more than six decades-long presence in south Korea the U.S. forces have staged war exercises almost every day, threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula and bringing the situation to the brink of war. 
					
					 The article notes:
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces remain unchanged in the above-said moves. This is evidenced by the fact that the U.S. military which once staged a drama in a bid to create impression that it intended to shift the 8th Army Command of the U.S. forces to Hawaii from south Korea, but it gave up that hypocritical drama and decided to keep it in south Korea as it was and set up the US KORECOM, a new mechanism for a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 The military provocations and above-mentioned war moves of the south Korean warmongers in league with foreign forces constitute another factor of escalating the tension on the peninsula and seriously threatening the peace and security there. 
					
					 They are now putting spurs to the restructuring of the overall armed forces, the development of up-to-date war equipment and introduction of weapons and equipment from abroad, crying out for "acquiring the capability for independently carrying out war." They perpetrated a serious armed provocation in the waters of the West Sea some days ago. 
					
					 The above-said moves of the U.S. and south Korean militaries are dangerous developments as they vitiate the atmosphere of dialogue, disturb the peace and security on the peninsula and put the danger of war of aggression against the DPRK into extremes. 
					
					 No ever-more reckless moves on the part of the warlike forces at home and abroad to ignite a nuclear war at any cost quite contrary to the trend of the times toward detente and peace can ever hold in check the dynamic advance of the Koreans to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, stresses the article.

articles.title: Anniversary of Naming of Kim Il Sung's Street Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Naming of Kim Il Sung's Street Observed
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A function took place in Phnom Penh on Nov. 11 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the naming of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung's Street.
					 Present at the function were personages of the Committee for the Preservation and Management of the street and the city of Phnom Penh, the DPRK ambassador to Cambodia, staff members of his embassy and officials of the Pyongyang Friendship Center.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Deputy Mayor Map Sarin, chairman of the Phnom Penh City Council who doubles as chairman of the above-mentioned committee, said the council would continue paying great attention to further modernizing the street, a symbol of friendship between the two countries, and preserving and managing it well.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Observed in Trinidad
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Observed in Trinidad
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was inaugurated in Trinidad and Tobago on Nov. 5 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Shapira Khan, chairman of the Trinidad and Tobago-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including seminar and film show on the above-said occasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
  Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera la delegacion de los cuadros del Partido Comunista de China presidida por Wang Wei, miembro del Comite Permanente de la Comision  Central de Control Disciplinario del PCCh y viceministro de Supervision de China, de visita en Corea.
					  El jefe de la delegacion lo entrego el dia 19 al secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok.

articles.title: Desarrollado en Corea nuevo reactivo "HCV-PHA"
articles.content:
esarrollado en Corea nuevo reactivo "HCV-PHA"
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Instituto de Biomedicina de la Academia de Ciencias Medicas de Corea acabo de desarrollar el reactivo diagnostico del anticuerpo del virus de la hepatitis tipo C "HCV-PHA" usando la tecnologia sofisticada de preparacion.
					Este reactivo hecho aplicando la tecnica de recombinacion de genes se usa en la diagnosis extracorporal para examinar el anticuerpo dentro de la sangre con el antigeno relacionado con el virus de la hepatitis tipo C.
					
					"HCV-PHA", elaborado principalmente con el genoma del virus separado y filtrado del suero del paciente, es capaz de medir de modo cientifico el anticuerpo mencionado que era muy dificil de distinguir hasta ahora.
					
					En el proceso de examen clinico, quedaron comprobados los altos niveles de susceptibilidad y peculiaridad del nuevo invento que ya comenzo a usarse en los organos sanitarios de todo el pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere al perturbador de la paz de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere al perturbador de la paz de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En desafio a la sinceridad y los esfuerzos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, Estados Unidos y los belicistas surcoreanos libran demencialmente los ejercicios de guerra para agredir a la primera.
					  Esto vuelve a corroborar que son ellos mismos los autores que agravan la confrontacion y la tension militares y crean el peligro de guerra. 
					
					  Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido en su edicion de este jueves y continua: 
					
					  El factor principal que perturba la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana es la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano por las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y sus maniobras belicas anti-RPDC que se recrudecen cada dia mas.
					
					  Durante mas de 60 anos pasados, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea arman casi todos los dias los alborotos belicos amenazando la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y llevando la situacion al borde de la guerra. 
					
					  Una vez, el circulo militar estadounidense orquestaba una farsa para hacer pensar que la comandancia de su 8o ejercito enclavado en el Sur de Corea iba a mudarse a Hawai. Pero, ahora decidio mantenerla en el suelo surcoreano y fundar la "comandancia EE.UU.-Sur de Corea", nuevo aparato para la guerra anti-RPDC. 
					
					  Estos datos bastan para constatar que siguen siendo invariables las maniobras del sector belicista de EE.UU. orientadas a lanzar la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					    La provocacion militar y las maniobras por el estilo, en que incurren los belicistas surcoreanos en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, devienen otra causa que agrava la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y amenaza gravemente la paz y la seguridad de esta zona. 
					
					  Hablando ahora de "adquirir la capacidad de cumplir la guerra de modo independiente", ellos dan acicate a la reestructuracion de las fuerzas armadas en general, al desarrollo de los equipos belicos ultramodernos y a la introduccion de los armamentos desde ultramar. 
					
					De mal en peor, cometieron hace unos dias una grave provocacion armada contra la RPDC en el Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					
					  Tales maniobras de EE.UU. y la capa militar del Sur de Corea envenenan el ambiente del dialogo, hacen danos a la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y agrandan al extremo los riesgos de guerra anti-RPDC. 
					
					  Aunque los belicistas internos y externos actuan cada dia mas desesperados por desatar a toda costa una guerra nuclear desafiando a la tendencia de la epoca hacia el alivio de la tension y la paz, no podran detener jamas la marcha impetuosa de la nacion coreana que lucha por la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad ateniendose a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.

articles.title: Camboya: acto conmemorativo de la denominacion de Avenida Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Camboya: acto conmemorativo de la denominacion de Avenida Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en Phnom Penh el acto conmemorativo del 15o aniversario de la denominacion de la Avenida Generalisimo Kim Il Sung.
					En la ocasion participaron las personalidades del Comite de Administracion para el Mantenimiento y la Conservacion de la Avenida Generalisimo         Kim Il Sung y la ciudad de Phnom Penh, el embajador y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en ese pais, asi como los funcionarios del Centro de Amistad Pyongyang.
					
					En la ocasion hubo intervenciones.
					
					El subalcalde Map Sarin, quien es presidente del comite arriba mencionado y del Consejo Urbano de Phnom Penh, subrayo que ellos seguiran prestando mucha atencion a modernizar y mantener esa avenida, simbolo de la amistad entre ambos paises.
